translation.en: [man sighs] Okay, here we go. I think it's all set.
-[man] Love it! -[woman] Want me to do it?
[woman] Teddy, you like your new fire truck?
Look at the camera. Look and say, "Hi, Mom."
Well, look at her and say it.
-Oh, be careful, honey. -[Dad] Get the camera.
Look at this, huh! It's your sister.
Katie Cat! That's good, dude. Gimme some.
Merry Christmas 2008! Santa got Teddy a bike!
-All right, wave to Mom. Say "Hi, Mom." -Hi, Mom!
It's Christmas 2011! Whoo! What did we get?
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! What are you doing, you guys? Come on!
All right? What-- What do we do? We...
Okay, so most people don't know this, but reindeer love candy canes. Watch.
translation.ko: 사람들이 잘 모르는데 순록은 지팡이 사탕을 좋아해

translation.en: -I want a reindeer! -[Mom] You want a reindeer?
[Dad] Oh, really? Where are we gonna keep this reindeer?
translation.ko: - 그래? 순록을 어디서 키우나? - 물고기는 어떨까?

translation.en: -How about a fish? You want a fish? -[Dad] No, let's go with the reindeer.
translation.ko: - 그래? 순록을 어디서 키우나? - 물고기는 어떨까? - 물고기 정도는... - 아니, 순록도 좋아

translation.en: -[Mom] Look, look! She's eating it! -[Kate] So cool!
-Merry Christmas from the Pierce family! -[Dad] ♪ Merry Christmas! ♪
translation.ko: 피어스 가족이 크리스마스 인사드려요! 메리 크리스마스!

translation.en: Teddy is about to open his present from Daddy.
-Mommy doesn't really approve, okay. -This is a big one! [clears throat]
-So cool. A knife. -[Mom chuckles] What's it say?
-"A Pierce always sees it through." -That's right.
-Everyone get together. -A picture. All right, guys.
[sighs] Dear Santa, this is Kate Pierce.
Just wanted to say that I've been really good this year.
I know I haven't been doing too well in school,
translation.ko: 학교 성적이 아주 좋은 건 아니에요

translation.en: especially since I got a D minus in Spanish.
I have a really hard time with languages.
But I promise to get my grades up in the new year.
translation.ko: 하지만 새해에는 더 좋은 성적을 받을게요

translation.en: I help out Mom a lot. She has to work at the hospital most nights,
translation.ko: 전 엄마를 많이 도와드려요 밤마다 병원에서 일하셔서

translation.en: so I start dinner three, four times a week,
do the dishes, and take out the trash.
And I try not to get into too much trouble.
I do say bad words every now and then,
but that's only when my brother, Teddy, makes fun of me and I lose my sh--
translation.ko: 제 오빠인 테디가 저를 놀리면 열받...

translation.en: Anyway, Santa, I'm not asking for much this Christmas.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 산타 할아버지 큰 선물 기대하지 않을게요

translation.en: You know, the red one with the skeleton on it?
My brother, Teddy, won't even let me touch his.
[Kate] I wouldn't waste my time getting him any presents.
translation.ko: 오빠한테 선물하는 시간 낭비는 안 할 거예요

translation.en: He's turning into a real loser-- Ow! Teddy, what the hell?
-Talking smack about me? -[Kate] Let go! You're gonna break it!
Who cares? This camera's like 20 years old.
If it's good enough for Dad, it's good enough for me. Now, give it back!
translation.ko: 아빠가 좋아했던 거라면 낡아도 괜찮아, 이리 줘!

translation.en: I can't believe you're still making video letters to Santa.
translation.ko: 요즘도 산타한테 영상 편지 쓰다니 충격이야

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, you really have no clue, do you?
chance that he's gonna watch a video.
translation.ko: 산타가 그 영상을 볼 가능성은 없다고

translation.en: He only reads handwritten letters sent in the mail.
translation.ko: 손으로 써서 우편으로 보낸 편지만 읽어

translation.en: -[laughs] What? -You can't leave me alone in the house.
translation.ko: - 뭐? - 나 혼자 집에 두고 갈래?

translation.en: Don't worry, guys! Everything's gonna be okay!
-[boy 2] Not too bad, man. -[boy] Let's get outta here.
You have a good time with your friends?
Get outta my room. You're not allowed in here.
translation.ko: 내 방에서 나가 넌 출입 금지야

translation.en: And you're not allowed to steal cars from the deli parking lot.
translation.ko: 식품점 주차장에서 차 훔치는 것도 금지야

translation.en: -I didn't steal a car. -I saw the whole thing.
translation.ko: - 누가 차를 훔쳐? - 내가 다 봤어

translation.en: When Mom sees this, she's gonna freak out!
She's so sick of your crap, I bet she turns you in to the cops herself!
Gimme that tape, you little creep!
-[Teddy] Gimme that now! Come on! -No! -Gimme it! -[both grunting]

translation.ko: - 오빠 진짜 짜증 나! - 이리 내!

translation.en: -Ow! Stop! It's mine! -[Teddy] Come on, stop being such a baby!
translation.ko: - 테디, 그만! 이거 내 거야! - 어린애처럼 굴래?

translation.en: -[Kate] Stop! -What the hell is going on?
Is this what happens when I leave?
He did something really horrible, and I have proof! [pants]
translation.ko: 오빠가 나쁜 짓 한 증거를 잡았어요

translation.en: He shoved me against the wall, into this picture.
[tearfully] You know what I want for Christmas?
translation.ko: 내가 원하는 크리스마스 선물이 뭔지 아니?

translation.en: I want for the two of you to get along.
You're her older brother. I expect more from you.
Teddy, please put the tree back up.
And put the lights on, while you're at it. I've only been asking you all week!
translation.ko: 그리고 전구 장식해 달라고 일주일 내내 말했잖아?

translation.en: Come on, you guys! Dad would've had this place looking--
translation.ko: 얘들아, 부탁이야 아빠가 이 꼴을 보면...

translation.en: Kate, help me unload the groceries.
translation.ko: 케이트 장 본 거 같이 옮기자

translation.en: [chuckling] This does not look like a Christmas tree. It looks like--
Whoa, whoa! You want some cookie with those sprinkles? Golly!
translation.ko: 어머, 스프링클 범벅 쿠키를 먹고 싶어? 엄청나네

translation.en: -Thanks. -I think they should all be like that.
[sighs] Isn't there someone else that can...
Yeah, no, of course. I'll-- I'll be right there.
-I don't want to. -[Kate] But it's Christmas Eve!
Well, even more reason for me to be at the hospital, honey.
Some people have no one else to take care of them.
But there's still so much to do.
We have to hang the stockings and make the eggnog!
-It just won't be Christmas without it! -[Mom] Oh, honey.
There is more to Christmas than all that stuff.
I'm gonna pretend like I didn't hear that, Mom.
translation.ko: 그 말은 못 들은 셈 칠게요

translation.en: -[Mom] Where? -Me and my friends are going caroling.
You haven't been caroling since you were in kindergarten, and you hated it.
Just wanna spread a little Christmas cheer.
Okay, well, you can't go, 'cause I need to work.
Which is why you're gonna stay home with your sister.
You are not to leave this house, young man!
You leave her alone again, and you are grounded!
translation.ko: 또 혼자 두고 나가면 외출 금지야

translation.en: Take the cookies out in 20 minutes, all right?
And don't stay up too late. And no soda! [smooches]
translation.ko: 너무 늦게 자지 마 탄산음료도 마시지 말고

translation.en: And listen, absolutely no junk food, okay?
See you guys tomorrow, bright and early.
Wanna watch a movie? Mom's gone, so it can be PG-13 or maybe even R!
translation.ko: 영화 볼까? 엄마 없으니까 12세 관람가나 어른 영화도 돼!

translation.en: -I'm gonna go to my room. -But it's Christmas Eve!
I told you to stop calling me that.
You used to laugh when I called you Teddy Bear,
and I was your Katie Cat.
all you wanna do is hang out with your wannabe gangster friends.
You know... at least they're fun.
They're not boring slugs like you.
-[Dad] Mm, cookies. -[Mom] No! You've had enough, mister!
[Dad] Is there any chance I can open a Christmas present early?
[chuckles] No, we have way too much to do.
-[Dad] What is this? What is this? -[Mom] What are you doing?
translation.ko: - 뭐? 이게 뭐야? - 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: -I know. -[Dad] I think I like it.
[Mom sighs] Where are you going? Wait. Honey... [Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree O Christmas tree... ♪
[Mom whispers] You're gonna wake up the kids! -[Mom screams, laughs] -[Dad] ♪ Don't care if the kids wake up ♪
translation.ko: - 애들 다 깨겠어 - 애들이 깬들 어떠리

translation.en: [Mom] Seriously? -[Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree ♪ -[Mom] Shh! [Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree ♪
-[Dad] ♪ ...up ♪ -[Mom] Seriously? Shh! [Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree O Christmas tree ♪
Teddy, get down here! You've gotta see this!
-[Kate] You know who that looks like. -[Teddy] Aunt Peggy.
No way. That person isn't wearing an ugly Christmas sweater.
translation.ko: 아니야, 저 사람은 촌스러운 스웨터 안 입었잖아
게다가 페기 이모가 이브에 오신 적은 없었어

translation.en: Aunt Peggy's never here on Christmas Eve. And if she was,
translation.ko: 게다가 페기 이모가 이브에 오신 적은 없었어 혹시 오셨다면 엄마, 아빠가 깜깜한 거실에

translation.en: why would Mom and Dad leave her alone in the living room
translation.ko: 혹시 오셨다면 엄마, 아빠가 깜깜한 거실에

translation.en: in the dark? Maybe it was a burglar.
would've had to been standing flat up against the wall like this, next to the--
translation.ko: 이렇게 벽에 납작하게 붙어있었던 게 분명해

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! The fireplace! I just got goosebumps!
-Come on, Teddy. You know it's him. -Kate...
Hey, we should make a video!
Tonight! Maybe we can get a shot of the whole Santa Claus, and not just his hand!
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에는 손 말고 산타 전신을 찍는 거야!

translation.en: You don't think anyone's thought of that before? Catching Santa in the act?
translation.ko: 산타를 현장에서 붙잡겠다는 생각을 너만 했을 것 같니?

translation.en: Yeah, but have you ever heard of anyone actually pulling it off?
No! They probably don't think it's possible. But it is!

translation.ko: 증거가 있어 산타의 행동이 증명된 비디오!

translation.en: A video showing exactly how he does it. It's gonna get a gazillion hits.
translation.ko: 증거가 있어 산타의 행동이 증명된 비디오! 조회 수가 엄청날걸!

translation.en: Please? Mom always says we should be helping each other out.
translation.ko: 엄마가 항상 둘이 돕고 지내라고 하셨잖아

translation.en: I don't think this is what she had in mind.
translation.ko: 이럴 때 도우란 말은 아니셨을 거야

translation.en: Look! I'll give you back the tape of you in the car.
And you can never say anything to Mom about it.
translation.ko: 엄마한테 아무 말도 안 하는 거야

translation.en: I saw it on Ghost Adventurers.
-Hey! Mom said no junk food! -Yeah, well, we gotta stay up somehow.
sometimes, you gotta break the rules for the greater good.
translation.ko: 큰일을 하려면 원칙을 어길 줄도 알아야 해

translation.en: Can't even remember the last time we did anything together, Teddy.
translation.ko: 우리가 뭘 같이 한 게 언제인지 기억도 안 나

translation.en: Just the two of us! Pulling an all-nighter!
-[Teddy] What the-- -He's on the roof, let's go!
-He's at the back of the house! -Get your coat!
[Teddy] Did you see that? It's Santa Claus!
We'll get a better view from the alley!
It's more beautiful than I ever imagined. [sighs]
Do you realize how big of a deal this is? I need to get a closer look.
translation.ko: 얼마나 엄청난 사건인지 모르겠어? 가까이에서 봐야겠어

translation.en: -Get down. -No way. Hand me the camera.
Be careful. You break your neck, and Mom will kill me.
translation.ko: 조심해! 네 목이 부러지면 난 엄마한테 사망이야!

translation.en: I wanted to get a closer look at the sleigh.
-Did he see us? -I don't think so.
We got enough footage. Let's get outta here.
-Why don't we just stay here? -Stay here? In the sleigh?
translation.ko: - 계속 있는 건 어때? - 여기? 썰매에?

translation.en: Yeah! How many kids get to ride with Santa in his sleigh on Christmas Eve?
translation.ko: 크리스마스이브에 산타 썰매를 타본 애가 몇이나 되겠어?

translation.en: [whispers] Hang in there. He's gonna go back down again.
-Teddy... -I could have swore I saw Paris!
Why? Because I'm not a big fat slob?
No, no. I-- I didn't mean it that way.
Ah, that's okay, Kate. I guess it's understandable.
I mean, who can eat millions of cookies in one night and not get fat, right?
translation.ko: 하룻밤에 쿠키 수백만 개를 먹고 살 안 찔 사람이 있을까?

translation.en: I don't go, "Ho ho ho." That's a myth.
translation.ko: 안 한다, '호, 호, 호' 그건 뜬소문이야

translation.en: You two have really messed things up.
You were supposed to be asleep.
What did you do with my sack of presents?
We came back over Moscow and...
Reindeer must've broken off somewhere over Lakeshore Drive.
That means we traveled thousands of miles in, like, 30 seconds.
If I'm not up and running in the next couple of hours,
translation.ko: 몇 시간 안에 다시 출발하지 않으면

translation.en: half the continent's not gonna get presents, and that,
Uh, so a few brats don't get presents. It's not the end of the world.
translation.ko: 애들 몇 명 선물 안 줘서 지구가 멸망하겠어요?

translation.en: That's just the kinda lame garbage I'd expect from a Lost Believer.
You listen to me, Teddy Pierce.
young boys and girls all over the globe are waiting, hoping,
Well, you don't wanna know what happened the last time I couldn't make my rounds.
translation.ko: 지난번에 건너뛰고 어떻게 됐는지 궁금하지 않겠지

translation.en: You've heard of the Dark Ages?
Read about all those wars in school?
translation.ko: 학교에서 세계 대전에 관한 책도 읽었지?

translation.en: Wait, those happened because you missed Christmas?
Christmas spirit is more powerful than you could ever imagine.
People need Christmas to remind themselves of how good they can be!
translation.ko: 자신이 얼마나 착한지 다시 돌아보는 날이 크리스마스야

translation.en: Without it, well, Christmas simply... must endure!
translation.ko: 그런 게 없다면... 어쨌든 크리스마스는 계속돼야 해!

translation.en: All right, I need to round up the reindeer, find my sack of presents,
translation.ko: 어쨌든 순록을 구해서 선물 자루를 찾은 후

translation.en: call the elves, and maybe, just maybe, I can still save Christmas. [grunts]
translation.ko: 엘프들에게 연락하면 크리스마스를 망치지 않을 길이 열릴 거야

translation.en: The closer you get, the faster it chimes.
At least it's not that far away. [sighs]
Oh no, no, no, no, no, no, no!
Oh, that-- that won't help. Your hat's not magic.
translation.ko: 그건 소용이 없지 네 모자에는 마법이 없잖니?

translation.en: Well, how do you think I can turn into coal dust
translation.ko: 그게 아니면 내가 어떻게 잿가루로 변하고

translation.en: and leap from rooftop to rooftop?
[sighs] I can't believe this! She told me,
translation.ko: 믿을 수가 없군 아내 말이 맞아

translation.en: "You should always bring a spare, Nick!"
Well... I guess I'm gonna have to do this the old-fashioned way.
Santa, just let us help you!
Oh, no, no, no. I think you've done quite enough damage already, don't you?
No, you just go on back to your house and get some sleep.
translation.ko: 너희는 집에 돌아가서 자는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: No need to wake up early.
[scoffs] You two are on the naughty list for life.
We can't just stay here! Santa needs us!
I don't know. He seems pretty mad.
translation.ko: 우리한테 굉장히 화가 난 것 같아

translation.en: We're, like, a thousand miles away!
Teddy, you heard him. We're on the naughty list for life!
translation.ko: 산타 말 들었잖아 평생 말썽꾸러기 명단 신세래!

translation.en: I mean, that's, like, the worst possible thing a kid could ever do!
translation.ko: 어린이가 저지를 수 있는 최악의 범죄 아니야?

translation.en: Do you really wanna tell your kids that you were that guy?
The person responsible for the Christmas Meltdown of 2018?
Ah, well, I can't do anything to stop you.
You better watch out, you better not pout, and you better not cry.
translation.ko: 그래도 조심해 삐죽대지 말고 울면 안 돼

translation.en: I don't have time for any more of your shenanigans.
♪ Here comes Santa Claus Here comes Santa Claus ♪
Uh, I don't think I'm supposed to be in here.
translation.ko: 저는 여기 들어오면 안 될 것 같아요

translation.en: Just stay next to me, but I'll do the talking.
translation.ko: 내 옆에 가만히 있어 말은 내가 할게

translation.en: -How do you know my name? -[chuckles] You got so big!
translation.ko: - 제 이름을 어떻게 아시죠? - 정말 많이 컸구나

translation.en: Ah, you know what I mean. Grown-up big!
Now, do you remember that letter you sent me about dreaming of being a fashion designer?
translation.ko: 패션 디자이너가 되겠다고 편지 보냈던 기억 나지?

translation.en: She used to always ask for sewing kits,
I think it was 2009 when you made all the stockings by yourself.
Well, I'm sorry the fashion designer thing didn't quite pan out.
translation.ko: 패션 디자인 쪽으로 진출하지 못한 건 안타깝구나

translation.en: Yeah, I wanted to go to Parsons and live in New York,
but I couldn't afford the tuition.
Is this some kind of reality show? How do you know all that stuff?
Did you talk to my mom?
Oh, no, no, no. I certainly wouldn't ruin the surprise
translation.ko: 아니야 네가 엄마한테 만들어 드린 멋진 스카프의 비밀은 지켜줘야지

translation.en: of that beautiful scarf you made for your mom.
translation.ko: 네가 엄마한테 만들어 드린 멋진 스카프의 비밀은 지켜줘야지

translation.en: -Wendy, we've got a big problem. -[laughs] We need a ride into the city.
translation.ko: 웬디, 큰 문제가 생겼어 시내로 들어갈 차가 필요해

translation.en: Oh, I don't have a car. Can you call an Uber?
translation.ko: 저는 차가 없어요 우버 불러서 가시죠

translation.en: Oh, you guys got any cash on you?
You think I can pay the driver... with these?
You know what? Um... Here, take my tips.
Um, although I don't think it's enough to cover
-a cab ride-- -That's very kind of you,
but I'm sure somebody in here will help us out.
translation.ko: 하지만 누군가 도와줄 사람이 있을 거야

translation.en: Uh, sorry for the intrusion, folks.
-The real Santa Claus! -Yeah, that's okay, Kate.
-Not just one of those phony mall ones. -I've got this.
translation.ko: - 쇼핑몰에 있는 가짜가 아니죠 - 내가 할게

translation.en: You don't look like Santa Claus.
Yeah, well, billboards add 80 pounds, Freddie.
we've got ourselves an emergency situation here.
And if you all want presents under the tree and in your stockings in the morning,
translation.ko: 트리 밑과 양말 속에서 선물을 꺼내고 싶다면

translation.en: who here can give us a ride into the city so I can find my reindeer?
translation.ko: 내 순록이 있는 시내까지 태워다 줄 사람?

translation.en: [in Hindi] You guys have a car you can lend me?
[in English] And I speak English, you moron.
translation.ko: 그리고 나도 영어 알아요 이 양반아

translation.en: Larry, you drove your Porsche here tonight, didn't you?
-Yeah. -How would you like to trade that Porsche
I know you've always wanted one.
-It's a deal. It's a deal. -I thought so.
You're not trading our Porsche for a baseball card, Larry!
-Know what that is worth? -What it's worth? Nothing!
-[Larry and Santa groan] -That's what it's worth!
There is a maniac dressed in a weird Santa costume harassing the customers.
translation.ko: 이상한 산타 옷을 입은 미치광이가 식당 손님을 괴롭히고 있어요

translation.en: He's got two kids with him. It could be an AMBER Alert situation.
translation.ko: 애들을 둘 데리고 있어요 유괴 사건 같아요

translation.en: -We gotta get out of here. -[Santa] Jeff! I know
-you've had a hard time believ-- -Okay, sorry, folks!
translation.ko: - 너는 항상 믿지 않았지 - 죄송해요, 여러분

translation.en: -What has gotten into you? -Okay, Santa, let's go!
translation.ko: - 왜 이래? - 그래요, 산타! 그만 가요

translation.en: Now, old Charlie here is in the Naughty List Hall of Fame!
translation.ko: 우리 찰리는 말썽꾸러기 명예의 전당 멤버야

translation.en: Ah, you just got outta the joint again, what, about a month ago, Charlie?
I don't think your parole officer would be too happy
translation.ko: 며칠 전 네가 빨강 닷지 챌린저를

translation.en: if he knew you'd stolen that red Dodge Challenger a couple of days ago, do you?
translation.ko: 훔친 걸 보호 감찰관이 알면 뭐라고 할까?

translation.en: Yeah, well, what my parole officer doesn't know won't hurt him.
translation.ko: 보호 감찰관이야 알 턱이 없으니 괜찮은데

translation.en: You, on the other hand, might not be so lucky!
translation.ko: 너는 운이 좋을 것 같지 않아

translation.en: After all, my friend Teddy here is headed down the same path.
translation.ko: 내 친구 테디도 너처럼 자랄 거야

translation.en: I mean, he's still a little young, but...
you keep going, couple years, this could be you.
translation.ko: 그대로 살면 몇 년 후에 요렇게 돼

translation.en: Prison tattoos and slinging tequila shots!
-Okay, that's it! -All right, out! Out, out, out, out! Bye, Wendy!
Let's go! Okay, hold the doors!
Oh no! Christmas spirit's already down 35%.
We need to get things back on track.
She's our friend and she's crazy!
If you come back here, she'll kill you! You hear me? She'll kill you...
translation.ko: 돌아오지 않으면 널 죽일 거야 안 들리니? 널 죽인다고!

translation.en: No, no, no, no. Teddy, Teddy, I don't think this is such a good idea.
translation.ko: 그러면 안 되지, 테디 잘하는 짓이 아니야

translation.en: Oh, come on! Do you wanna save Christmas?
Well, not by stealing a car.
Uh, that kinda undermines the whole naughty or nice concept, don't you think?
translation.ko: 내 말은 이게 착한 건지 나쁜 건지 헷갈리잖아

translation.en: Don't you break into, like, a billion homes every year?
translation.ko: 매년 그 많은 집에 몰래 침입하시면서요?

translation.en: -I mean, technically, that's illegal, too. -Fair point.
And, plus, it's not just any car.
I mean, we're not even breaking the law because...
you know, the car's already stolen.
-And when we're finished, we'll just-- -Turn it in to the police.
All right, now, slow down. Just be cool. Walk regular. Regular.
Hey, hey, slow down! Slow down! You're not even old enough to drive!
translation.ko: 테디, 천천히 가! 넌 운전할 나이도 아니야!

translation.en: -No, it's not! You stole it! -Get in, get in!
Hey, don't worry, Charlie. I just reported it stolen.
translation.ko: 걱정 말아요, 찰리 방금 도난 차량으로 신고했어요

translation.en: No one's following us, so you can slow down.
translation.ko: 아무도 따라오지 않아요 속도 줄여, 테디

translation.en: Oh, come on, I'm not even going that fast!
All right, now we're getting somewhere.
Uh, Santa, you know that stuff's junk, right?
Yeah, well, Katie Cat, one man's junk...
Teddy, I'm gonna need your knife.
Uh, Santa, that's not how you work the radio.
translation.ko: 산타, 라디오는 그렇게 트는 게 아니에요

translation.en: on the corner of Naperville and Roslyn. Car 476 responding.
-How did you just-- -I am the greatest toymaker on Earth.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 하신 거죠? - 지구 최고의 장난감 장인이니까

translation.en: [man on radio] All units, we have a reported grand theft auto.
translation.ko: 전 대원 들어라 차량 절도 신고가 들어왔다

translation.en: A 2014 red Dodge Challenger, license plate six, Bravo, Lima, seven, two, four.
Stolen by two kids and an extremely large man.
translation.ko: 용의자는 아동 둘과 체격이 거대한 남성이다

translation.en: [chuckles] A guy goes to the gym every day,
stays away from sugar and carbs, what difference does it make? Oh man.
translation.ko: 설탕과 탄수화물을 안 먹어도 이런 소리를 들으니, 제길

translation.en: [man 2 on radio] Attention, we have sightings of what appear to be...
translation.ko: 전 대원에 알린다 다수의 신고가 들어왔다

translation.en: -Just what we're looking for. -[man 2] Not a joke.
I have a team of reindeer headed southbound on Michigan Avenue,
-That way! Go! -The, uh... The car can't fly, Santa.
translation.ko: - 저쪽으로 출발! - 이 차는 못 날거든요, 산타?

translation.en: Right, habit. Okay, left on State, right on Erie, left on Michigan.
translation.ko: 깜빡했군, 스테이트에서 좌회전 이리 우회전, 미시건 좌회전

translation.en: How do you know so much about Chicago?
I know every street in the world, kid.
Teddy, you think we could pick it up a little bit?
translation.ko: 테디, 조금만 속도를 낼 수 있겠니?

translation.en: See if we can find my reindeer.
[Kate] You guys! There-- There they are!
Back down that street! Turn around, Teddy! Turn around!
translation.ko: 저 뒤쪽 길에요! 차를 돌려, 테디!

translation.en: Did I say Dasher? [chuckles] I always forget Vixen. Vixen!
translation.ko: 내가 대셔라고 했니? 빅센을 꼭 빠뜨린다니까, 빅센!

translation.en: -Teddy and I are gonna buy you some time. -What?
We can't leave my sister all alone out here.
translation.ko: 제 동생 혼자 보낼 순 없어요

translation.en: -[Teddy] But I think-- -She said she can handle it, Teddy.
I've always believed in you, Kate.
You can do this. Go get 'em.
[Santa] All right, all right. Hey, hey, hey, hey. I'm driving! I'm-- Dude! Out!
translation.ko: 얘야, 내가 운전할게 이 녀석아, 비켜!

translation.en: Come on, quick! Here we go!
[Teddy] Oh, my God! It's an automatic!
-I'm a little rusty! Relax! -[Teddy] It's not that complicated!
I mean, I'm used to something with more pop under the hood,
translation.ko: 난 엔진이 요란한 차가 더 익숙하다만

translation.en: but, man, this baby really handles!
I mean, can't you just wave your hand and Jedi mind trick the cops?
translation.ko: 제다이처럼 경찰을 세뇌할 손재주 같은 건 없어요?

translation.en: I'm Santa Claus, Teddy, not Yoda. [grunts]
I won't hurt you. I'm with Santa.
I'm one of the good guys.
Wow, you're really famous where I come from!
Is it okay if I take you to him?
[laughs] Trading in eight reindeer for 400 horses!
-[laughing] -We've been in enough crashes for one night, don't you think?
translation.ko: 하룻밤 사이에 사고가 너무 많은 거 아닌가요?

translation.en: -Hang on. I think I can lose 'em! -[grunts]
[panting] Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
If you ever meet Mrs. Claus...
[man on speaker] Hands outside the vehicle!
-Step out of the car! -You gotta be kidding.
-Get out of the car! -You heard the man! Get out! Now!
[laughs] Look at the two of you, all grown up!
Now, they were always good kids. Well, almost--
[Dave] You are under arrest for driving a stolen vehicle!
translation.ko: - 거의 그랬지 - 체포합니다 절도 차량 운전 혐의로

translation.en: Yeah, the car's stolen, but we didn't steal it.
We were just borrowing it before bringing it back to the station.
translation.ko: 경찰서에 갖다 주기 전에 잠깐 빌려 탔지

translation.en: That's the first time I heard that one. How about you, Dave?
translation.ko: 이런 핑계는 처음 듣네 넌 어때, 데이브?

translation.en: This job's always full of surprises.
I'm not joking! We're gonna return the car, good as new!
translation.ko: 농담이 아니야 새 차 상태로 돌려주려고 했어

translation.en: Yeah? How you plan on doing that?
Elves? Right. They're good with bodywork?
They build thousands of cars every year.
Oh yeah? They work in Detroit?
[laughs] What was I thinking, Mr... uh... You know what? We never got your name.
translation.ko: 그러니까 말이죠, 저... 그러고 보니 이름을 못 물었군요

translation.en: Right, right. Why don't you give us a "Ho ho ho"
-so we really know it's you? -I don't do "Ho ho ho."
translation.ko: - 진짜인지 확인하게요 - 안 한다, '호, 호, 호'

translation.en: Tell us what you're doing on Christmas Eve borrowing a car.
Speaking of which, it would be great if the two of you could help me
translation.ko: 말 나온 김에 순록 찾는 일을

translation.en: -track down my reindeer. -[Dave] No can do.
-Reindeer fall under Animal Control. -Give 'em a call!
translation.ko: 순록 사건은 - 동물 보호국 소관이거든요 - 연락해

translation.en: Okay, Santa Claus. That's enough fun for one night.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 산타클로스 오늘의 말썽은 여기서 끝내죠

translation.en: -Gotta take you to the station. Let's go. -Wait! Look, it wasn't his fault.
translation.ko: 경찰서로 갑시다 잠깐만요 할아버지는 잘못이 없어요

translation.en: This was all me. I took the car.
What's this man's relationship with you, Teddy?
my... well, he came down my chimney.
[chuckles] No, I-- He's Santa Claus. That's...
I wouldn't have believed him either, but...
-I mean, I saw the sleigh, the reindeer-- -Where do you live, son?
Let me get this straight. You broke into this boy's residence
translation.ko: 정리 좀 하자 댁이 얘네 집에 불법 침입해

translation.en: -and took him a thousand miles from home? -Wait.
This wasn't my idea! Look, Mikey, Officer Jameson--
translation.ko: 내 뜻이 아니었어 마이키, 아니 제임슨 경관!

translation.en: -Impressive. You can read a name tag. -Unfortunately--
-saving Christmas ain't in your cards. -Yeah, well, it's gonna be tight!
translation.ko: 안타깝게도 크리스마스를 구한다는 영감님 계획은 - 포기하셔야겠네요 - 시간이 없어

translation.en: All right, Kate. Slow down. Slow down, Kate!
Whoa! Slow your roll. Get back here.
Find my sack of toys. It'll lead you to the elves.
translation.ko: 선물 자루를 찾아 이게 엘프에게 데려다줄 거다

translation.en: [Dave] Hey! Mikey, get the kid! I'm putting this guy in the car!
translation.ko: 마이키, 애 잡아! 난 영감님을 차에 태울게

translation.en: -They need to get up. -[Dave] Come on!
-What did he say? -All I heard was "jingle bells."
Fly for me! You can do it!
-[man] What am I looking at? -[indistinct radio chatter]
I can't believe it! We're flying!
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼 우리가 날고 있다니!

translation.en: I'm on Donner. What about you?
-That means we're close! -[Kate] Where do you think it is?
Let's land. It'll be easier to find from the ground.
-Hang tight and blend in! -Come on! Let's go, let's go!
You think it's inside the church?
-It's gotta be around here somewhere. -[Kate] Yeah...
He sang it every Christmas Eve. [sniffles]
You know, I haven't been to church since he...
Would it kill you to leave me alone for one minute?
He would be so disappointed in me.
That's because she knows, deep down,
you're not such a total screw-up.
Thanks. You're, uh... You're making me feel great.
I know I've been an awful brother, it's just...
I've been so mad at him.
I mean, he spent years helping other people, but where is he now?
translation.ko: 평생 남만 돕더니 이제 어디로 가셨지?

translation.en: Why did he have to go into that stupid fire?
[voice shaking] He had a wife... and two kids, and he gave it all up...
just to save some random strangers.
And now, I'd give anything just to tell him...
translation.ko: 이제 아빠한테 꼭 하고 싶은 말이 있어

translation.en: Teddy, you aren't such an awful brother.
Dad wouldn't be disappointed in you.
Because I see him all the time...
You're just saying that 'cause you wanna save Christmas.
You just gotta believe it, too.
Why must they keep drawing me like that?
translation.ko: 왜 나를 꼭 저 모양으로 그리냐고!

translation.en: I mean, does my butt really look that big to you?
Now, sit down or I'll cuff you to the desk.
Listen, pal. You can lose the shtick.
I've had a long day, so just tell me your name, and I don't wanna hear Santa Claus.
it's Saint Nicholas. I prefer Saint Nick.
And I'm actually... I'm not officially an official saint.
I mean, they haven't bestowed that title upon me officially, so...
-I guess it's who you know. -[Dave] Buddy,
I'm about at the end of my rope here.
So, what? Did you rob a toy store, too?
So, what is all this stuff?
You honestly don't remember, do you?
These are all the things you ever dreamed of when you were a kid.
translation.ko: 네가 어렸을 때 꿈속에서도 갖고 싶어한 것들이잖아

translation.en: Everything you ever really wanted for Christmas.
Starting from the age of six.
Mm. Now, you interrupted me at age nine.
-Should I continue? -[Dave] No. No, that-- that's enough.
Good, let's just fast-forward to this year.
You know what I want for Christmas?

translation.ko: - 자네 전처 - 리사가 누군지는 저도 압니다

translation.en: -How did you-- -She left you a couple years ago,
and all you want for Christmas is for her to come back.
translation.ko: 리사만 돌아오면 더 바랄 게 없다며?

translation.en: -Yeah, well, that ain't ever gonna happen. -Yeah, I think maybe.
translation.ko: - 불가능한 얘기죠 - 어쩌면 가능할 수도 있지

translation.en: Okay, look, pal. You don't walk in here and talk about my ex-wife.
translation.ko: 이봐요, 당신이 뭔데 내 전처 얘기까지 떠들어요!

translation.en: Dave, just-- just give her a call.
-She doesn't wanna talk to me. -Yes! Yes, she does!
Now, she's-- she's having second thoughts and...
[laughs] Now I know you're out of your tree.
I mean, you've always been a suspicious, doubtful type.
translation.ko: 원래 의심 많은 성격인 건 알아

translation.en: That's probably why you're a good cop.
But deep down, you know that I know what everybody wants for Christmas.
translation.ko: 사람들이 무슨 선물을 원하는지 내가 아는 거 확인했잖아?

translation.en: So, just give her a call, Dave!
I don't know how you know all this stuff.
I don't know where the reindeer came from.
I don't know where they went, but I know what the reality is.
translation.ko: 어디로 갔는지도 몰라요 하지만 사실만 말하죠

translation.en: You evaded a police officer, not to mention child endangerment
translation.ko: 경찰 명령에 불응했고 아동을 위험에 빠뜨렸으며

translation.en: Christmas spirit is already down to 31%.
The longer I stay in here, the lower it's gonna go,
translation.ko: 내가 여기 붙잡혀 있느라 수치가 더 떨어지면

translation.en: and the lower it goes means people are gonna start acting cranky.
And that's when bad things start to happen,
More than you've seen here in a long time, and we're in Chicago, for goodness' sake!
translation.ko: 최고치를 기록할 거야 시카고 신기록을 달성하겠지

translation.en: Oh, I expect this station will be bursting at the seams come morning.
But there is a bright spot, Dave.
There's still time for you to make it right.
I knew, given enough evidence, that eventually you'd come around.
translation.ko: 그래, 증거를 충분히 보여주면 믿을 줄 알았어

translation.en: I don't know if you're some kind of Las Vegas magician
or a freak who hacks into people's personal lives on the Internet.
Either way, hope you didn't make plans for New Year's.
translation.ko: 새해 계획 같은 건 안 세웠길 바라요

translation.en: You're gonna be here a while.
-[Kate] We're really close! -[Teddy] It's gotta be here!
Now we just need to get back to Santa. [gasps]
We're with Santa and we need your help!

translation.ko: 케이트! - 내 말 들려? - 테디, 들어와

translation.en: Well, that ain't what it sounded like.
If it's okay with you, I'll just be on my way.
Why are we even bothering with this fool?
translation.ko: 이런 애송이를 잡고 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: You think you're a tough guy?
What can possibly be in that bag...
that could be worth what's about to happen to you?
I think I'm in the North Pole. [chuckles softly]
[Kate] I know I haven't been doing too well in school,
translation.ko: 학교 성적이 아주 좋은 건 아니에요

translation.en: especially since I got a D minus in Spanish.
Dear Santa, This year we would like a pony for Christmas.
translation.ko: 산타 할아버지, 올해 선물로 조랑말을 받고 싶어요

translation.en: But Mom says the house is too small, so maybe just a puppy.
translation.ko: 하지만 엄마가 집이 좁대서 강아지도 좋아요

translation.en: [girl] And a really cool pair of awesome sunglasses.
I'm Bing Bellamy, and all I want for Christmas is a snowboard!
translation.ko: 전 빙 밸러미예요 스노보드를 받고 싶어요!

translation.en: I haven't written to you in a long time.
once you get older, the whole Christmas thing seems pretty lame.
This year, I have a special request.
I'd really like to see my dad again.
I'm not even sure if it's something you can do.
translation.ko: '산타가 할 수 있는 일인지 저도 모르겠어요'

translation.en: But I really need to tell him that--"
-[Elves speaking Elvish] -[Kate] Guys! Let me go!
What are you doing with my camera?
-Give it back! You're gonna break it. -[elf speaking Elvish]
[Kate] Hey, let me go! Guys, let me go!
Hey, come on, let me out!
Let me out of here! Let me out of here!
[in English] Let me explain what happened!
You see, after the sleigh crashed, -we lost the reindeer. -[elves gasp]
-[in Elvish] You lost the reindeer? -[crying] Blitzen!
[in English] Santa Claus told me to find you guys!
He said you guys were the only ones who would know what to do!
translation.ko: 어떻게 할지 아는 건 너희밖에 없다면서

translation.en: But, wow! I come from a long line -of True Believers! -[gasps]
[in Elvish] She is a True Believer!
[in English] And then the reindeer just... Boom! They just flew away!
Oh, you're gonna walk away from me? Huh?
translation.ko: 내 얘기 안 듣고 그냥 가겠다?

translation.en: I saw a bunch of reindeer fly into the night sky!
-I am not crazy! -[man] Yes, you are.
Man, have you ever seen anything like this?
I've never seen it this busy on Christmas Eve.
The least you could do is play some Christmas music.
Oh, brother, the mood in this place is really bringing Christmas spirit down,
Whoa! Christmas spirit is down to 19%?
If I don't do something quick, this night's over.
translation.ko: 빨리 방법을 찾지 않으면 날이 밝겠어!

translation.en: Do you remember what you got for Christmas in 1971?
I got the super fly Sunburst Epiphone Casino, man!
translation.ko: 난 끝내주는 선버스트 색 에피폰 카지노 기타를 받았어

translation.en: In, uh... In the pawn shop.
'Cause you two guys were really good.
Unfortunately, some other habits took precedence, you dig?
translation.ko: 그걸 뛰어넘는 재주가 튀어나온 걸 어쩌겠소

translation.en: and that means there's magic in the air!
-What am I supposed to do with this, man? -Play it.
-[laughs] I can't play this thing! -Are you sure?
♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪ -[women] ♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪ -[plays guitar solo]
-♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪ -[women] ♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Well, you've been A real good little girl ♪
♪ 'Cause Santa Claus is back in town ♪
♪ You gonna see me coming In a big black Cadillac! ♪
-♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪ -♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Well, you've been A real good little baby ♪
♪ 'Cause Santa Claus is back in town ♪
♪ Christmas ♪ Is there a piano in this joint?
Well, Christmas came early this year, huh?
Is this some kind of a joke?
Next time you morons waste my time...
translation.ko: 또 한 번만 내 시간을 낭비하면

translation.en: No! No, my sister's in there!
Look, I know it sounds crazy, but please don't do that!
translation.ko: 미친 소리 같겠지만 제발 그냥 두세요

translation.en: -Let me go, and nobody gets hurt! -[grunts]
Take care of him! -Put him in the dumpsters out back! -[grunts]
Hey, he's-- he's actually kinda cute.
Hey, little guy! What's your name?
[in Elvish] Time to take out the trash.
[man, in English] Let's get outta here!
[sighs, in Elvish] Wait. We missed one.
Wait! I'm one of the good guys!
[in Elvish] I never have any fun.
-[Teddy, in English] Kate, are you okay? -Better than okay!
-I can-- I see that. -[elf] Ow, ow!
-Let's get the reindeer and the sleigh. -The sleigh's busted.
translation.ko: - 순록과 썰매를 찾으러 가자 - 썰매는 망가졌어

translation.en: [in English] Cool! Now we just need to find Santa!
You guys know where he is?
-[elves chattering] -Poor Santa. I'll bet he's freaking out.
♪ Santa Claus is comin' Down your chimney tonight! ♪
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 산타클로스가 굴뚝을 타고 내려가신다!

translation.en: Down your chimney! ♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪
translation.ko: - 굴뚝을 타고 내려오신대! - 밖에는 눈이 내리네

translation.en: ♪ Well, you've been A real good little baby ♪
♪ 'Cause Santa Claus is back in town ♪
♪ Well, you've been A real good little baby ♪
-♪ 'Cause Santa Claus is back in town! ♪ -[whoops]
And the reindeer just... flew away!
Not too bad for our first gig, huh?
I have seen a lot of strange things in my time, but this...
translation.ko: 제가 살면서 별꼴을 다 봤습니다만 이건...

translation.en: this takes it to a whole other level.
Oh, wait till you see what happens next.
translation.ko: 다음 장면을 보면 더 놀랄 텐데?

translation.en: Okay, I want answers. Real answers, right now.
So first, why don't you answer that?
She invited me out for coffee this morning.
Well, that's, uh... That's my little buddy Hugg.
He's, uh... bringing me a present.
Mrs. Claus told you to take a spare.
[in English] Well, guys. It's been great jamming with you.
-[man 3] All right, man! -[man 4] Yeah! That's cool, man!
-[man 1] I don't know, man. -[man 2] We'll try. We'll try.
We can keep these, right, Santa?
-You busted outta jail! -First time for everything, Katie Cat!
translation.ko: - 유치장을 탈출했어요? - 언제나 처음은 있는 법이지

translation.en: [in English] Let's go to work. Whoa! No, no, no, no, no, no!
I lost all track of time.
[sighs] We've only got less than an hour before the sun rises.
But... we can still save Christmas, right?
We're at the end of my window, Kate.
Well... I mean, there's gotta be something we can do.
But that can't be! There can't be Christmas without presents!
translation.ko: 그럴 순 없어요, 선물이 없다면 크리스마스가 아니죠!

translation.en: We started something last night, and we're gonna finish it.
Now, I don't know how you guys do things in the North Pole, but...
a Pierce always sees it through.
But I haven't cut it this close in, I don't know, maybe ever.
translation.ko: 하지만 이렇게 시간이 부족한 적은 처음이야

translation.en: I-- I just don't see how it's possible.
You do the entire world in one night all by yourself!
translation.ko: 혼자서 하룻밤에 전 세계를 돌던 분이잖아요

translation.en: I mean, imagine what we could cover if we all work together!
Just think of us as Santa's helpers!
Well, I've never had human helpers in the sleigh before...
translation.ko: 썰매에 인간 도우미를 태우는 건 처음인데

translation.en: some way we could work together to...
We've only got a little bit of North America left.
If I didn't have to carry my sack, I could move twice as fast!
translation.ko: 자루를 들지 않으면 두 배 빨리 움직일 수 있어

translation.en: All right, this just might work!
Now, Kate, you're in charge of getting all the presents ready to go!
You just call out the addresses and the names,
and you throw 'em outta the sack.
Just chuck 'em out. I'll catch 'em, and I'll deliver!
translation.ko: 꺼내고 또 꺼내면 내가 받아서 배달할게

translation.en: And that means, Teddy, you drive!
[stammers] You-- You want me to drive... that?
[chuckles] Yeah, a car. But, I mean, this is... This is...
Now where is all that huff and puff about "A Pierce always sees it through"?
translation.ko: '피어스는 한다면 한다'고 허세 부리던 녀석은 어디 갔나?

translation.en: That was before you told me I was gonna have to drive!
translation.ko: 그건 썰매를 몰라고 말씀하시기 전의 얘기였죠

translation.en: Well, this is the only way we're gonna make it,
so I guess it's gonna be baptism by fire!
Well, maybe I can help Kate with presents, right?
translation.ko: 케이트의 선물 준비를 도우면 안 될까요?

translation.en: I told you, we're gonna have to move fast!
Come on! Hop in the back!
All right, you gotta hold them.
Now we're gonna see what you're made of!
Now, just think about where you wanna go...
Oh no, no, no, no! Santa, I can't do this!
translation.ko: 안 되겠어요, 산타 저는 못 해요

translation.en: Some things we gotta figure out on our own, Teddy.
translation.ko: 하다 보면 느는 것도 있어, 테디

translation.en: All right, here's the book with all the names and addresses.
translation.ko: 여기 모든 이름과 주소를 적은 책이 있어

translation.en: [Santa exclaims] Don't be afraid! Don't be afraid.
If there's one thing reindeer can smell, it's fear!
translation.ko: 순록이 겁쟁이 냄새는 기가 막히게 맡지!

translation.en: [Teddy] I can't control them! [grunts] Santa, this isn't funny!
translation.ko: 말을 안 들어요! 산타, 이거 장난이 아니라고요!

translation.en: Eight reindeer! How tough can it be?!
translation.ko: 겨우 순록 여덟 마리 몰면서 엄살도 심하지!

translation.en: -[rails screeching] -They won't go up! What do I need to do?
You've always just had to do one thing, Teddy.
translation.ko: 할 일은 오직 한 가지란다, 테디

translation.en: -But I do believe in you! -No, no, no! I'm not talking about me.
translation.ko: - 산타가 있다는 건 믿어요 - 날 믿으라는 게 아니야

translation.en: You have to believe in yourself.
The way your mother believes in you.
The way your father believed in you.
And a Pierce... -Always sees it through! -Yeah! [laughs]
On, Dasher! On, Dancer! On, Prancer! On, Vixen! On, Comet! On, Cupid! On, Donner! On, Blitzen!
translation.ko: 대셔, 딕슨, 프랜서 빅슨, 코멧, 가자!

translation.en: [Santa] All right, guys! This is it! Last city!
translation.ko: 얘들아, 드디어 다 됐다 마지막 도시야!

translation.en: -[in Elvish] Reporting for duty! -[all] Reporting for duty!
translation.ko: - 출동 준비 완료! - 출동 준비 완료!

translation.en: Ray, Scarlett, and Brooke Stuber, 3947 Jackson Street!
[in Elvish] Hunter and Connor Morris. They live on 4433 Pacific Avenue!
[in English] Hey, Santa! I just spoke Elvish!
-[watch ticking and chiming] -[in English] We did it!
His list. He's checking it twice.
[in Elvish] I told you, no food or drinks in the sleigh!
I just love my candy canes.
-[Kate, in English] What's wrong? -We missed one!
Sanchez family, Mexico City! We got exactly nine seconds!
translation.ko: 산체스 가족, 멕시코 시티야 남은 시간은 단 9초

translation.en: Teddy, want me to take the reins?
Yah! On, Dasher! On, Dancer! On, Prancer!
-There's no chimney! -Well, sometimes you gotta improvise!
-You did it! -[laughs] No! We did it!
All the presents delivered in record time, and Christmas spirit is up to 95%.
translation.ko: 선물 배달 신기록을 세우고 크리스마스 정신도 95%까지 올라갔어

translation.en: Hey, hey! We gotta get back to your house before your mom does!
translation.ko: 엄마 퇴근하기 전에 너희 집으로 가야지

translation.en: -I think I kinda like sitting over here. -[chuckles]
On, Dasher! On, Dancer! On, Prancer! On, Vixen! On, Comet! On, Cupid!
-[Santa] All right, now ease them down. -[reindeer bellowing]
Ease them down, that's it. Easy.
[laughs] Perfect four-point landing! And we beat your mom home, too!
-What was your favorite part? -Easy! Riding the reindeer!
translation.ko: - 뭐가 가장 좋았어? - 무조건 순록 타는 거지

translation.en: -[Kate] Being in the North Pole! -The car chase with the cops!
translation.ko: - 난 북극 여행 - 경찰과 추격전도 좋았어

translation.en: Hey, that was the best night of my whole life! Mine, too.
Oh, Christmas Eve is always the best night of my life.
But now, it's time for me to go home.
Will we ever see you again?
Uh-uh. Not if I can help it.
if I ever need two helpers...
I know where to find the best I've ever had.
He said the best human helpers he's ever had.
[chuckles] I expect to see your Spanish grades go up this year.
Now that you've learned another language.
-What? -[Kate] We forgot to get Mom a present.
Oh, that reminds me, though. [sighs] Uh...
Something I want you to have.
But... won't you need it to fly?

translation.ko: 잠깐만요, 그럼 간밤에 언제든 날 수 있는데...

translation.en: All right, now, I don't want any more people to see me, so...
translation.ko: 이제 사람들 눈에 띌 일은 그만해야겠다

translation.en: -Yup, and I've got it all on... -[camcorder beeping]
[laughs] Did you really think he was gonna let us keep it?
what if I forget everything that happened tonight?
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 일어난 일을 다 잊으면 어쩌지?

translation.en: Come on! I won't let you forget anything about tonight...
What are you guys doing out here?
It was a-- a gift from a friend.
We should go inside. It's freezing out here.
-[sighs] So, how was your night? -[Teddy] You'll never believe it.
translation.ko: - 밤에 뭐 했어? - 말해도 안 믿으실걸요

translation.en: Well, what did you guys do all ni--
This is exactly the way Dad used to...
This is the best Christmas present ever.
Look, there's presents. Go open some presents. [sniffles]
-[Teddy] Oh, this is yours. -[Kate] This is yours.
Aunt Peggy sure outdid herself this year.
I was kinda worried you weren't going to make the cut this year.
translation.ko: 올해는 착한 아이 명단에 못 들어갈 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Yeah. Guess I kinda worked it out in the final hour.
Yeah, I did. [chuckles] Figured I'd cover all the bases.
I'm sorry, I don't really have the power to grant your wish.
This was the best I could do.
There's a perfect spot for it on the tree.
-So, you're gonna wear a helmet with this? -Yes.
-♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪ -[door opens]
-♪ It's Christmas time, pretty baby ♪ -[woman sighs] So...
[in Elvish] Sounds like you had quite the night.
It was a bit more hectic than usual...
[in English] But, I did get to speak a lot of English last night!
translation.ko: 하지만 어젯밤에 영어 연습은 많이 했어

translation.en: [woman] Something about a... car chase and a... jailbreak?
Oh, you know how the elves exaggerate. They get excited at the drop of a hat.
translation.ko: 엘프들은 과장이 심하잖아 모자만 떨어뜨려도 난리야

translation.en: Were you just a little bit naughty last night?
Mm, I... In a nice way.
[Mrs. Claus] Do you want to watch a movie?
I had something else in mind.
